body_html: FYI, I hit the same problems here with interpreter code -- it is very is to be given a Variable object and assume if it is undefined that .data() would give an undefined Tensor, but instead it silently returns a nullptr which manifests later.

body: FYI, I hit the same problems here with interpreter code -- it is very is to be given a Variable object and assume if it is undefined that .data() would give an undefined Tensor, but instead it silently returns a nullptr which manifests later.
